description:
Rocky Bernstein
----------------------
Chief Mad Scientist at porcine software
----------------------
How is translating between English and Spanish similar to finding out where you are when you hit an error in your program? I'll show you how, and show off a program I've written to give the error location pretty precisely.

The technology behind this is pretty sophisticated, but the talk is aimed for a general audience.
----------------------
https://www.linkedin.com/in/rocky-b-abb8111/
https://github.com/rocky
--------------------------------------------

About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018 - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.


- The Python Software Foundation -
- EAFIT University - http://www.eafit.edu.co/
- HDE - https://www.hde.co.jp/en/

More About PyCon Colombia in http://www.pycon.co

Join us at our next conference, February 8 - 10, 2019 in Bogota, Colombia. More information in http://www.pycon.co
title: Rocky Bernstein - Decompilation and Pandora's box - PyCon Colombia 2018
